item.title: Bobby Blue Bland - Stormy Monday
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8677

They called it
stormy Monday
But Tuesday
is just a bad
They called it
stormy Monday
But Tuesday is
just a bad
Oh Wednesday is worst
and Thursday oh so say
The eagle
flies on friday
And Saturday
I’ll go out to play
Yeah eagle
flies on Friday
And Saturday
I’ll go out to play
Sunday
I’ll go to church
And I’ll go out
to play
Lord have mercy
Lord have mercy on me
You know I’m crazy
Lord have mercy
Lord have mercy
on me
You know I’m trying
trying about my baby
Lord somebody
please
Send her home to me
yeah-

Oh I crazy

on me

on me
